summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Survey360 scalability features - Redis caching with memory fallback, background job queue, database optimizations with connection pooling, and rate limiting
passed_tests: Health check endpoint returns cache and connection pool status
Survey360 templates endpoint returns 6 templates with caching working (first: 0.014s, second: 0.009s)
Backend initializes with all scalability features (health_check, template_caching, basic_api)
Cache fallback to memory working properly when Redis unavailable
Connection pool monitoring shows active connections (current: 7, available: 812, total_created: 218, active: 2)
Rate limiting functionality configured and working
Background job system accessible and configured
Database queries with optimized indexes perform well (0.014s query time)
